mapper.select: select a.* from t_shop_info a right join sys_user_shop b on a.id=b.shop_id where b.user_id=#{id}

SELECT t2.id,t2.shop_name,t2.shop_manager_id,t2.address,t2.tel,t2.area_id FROM sys_user_shop t1 INNER JOIN t_shop_info t2 ON t1.shop_id = t2.id WHERE t1.user_id = #{userId} AND t2.area_id = #{areaId} AND t1.is_del != TRUE AND t2.is_del != TRUE AND t2.is_use = TRUE UNION SELECT t4.id,t4.shop_name,t4.shop_manager_id,t4.address,t4.tel,t4.area_id FROM t_shop_info t4 WHERE t4.shop_manager_id = #{userId} AND t4.area_id = #{areaId} AND t4.is_del != TRUE AND t4.is_del != TRUE AND t4.is_use = TRUE

SELECT shopInfo.id, shopInfo.shop_name FROM t_shop_info shopInfo INNER JOIN sys_user_shop userShop ON userShop.shop_id = shopInfo.id AND userShop.user_id = #{userId} AND shopInfo.is_del = FALSE AND shopInfo.is_use = TRUE
